page.title: 11COMMUNICATIONS IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {ROYAL MAIL deliveries}twice daily,by vans in rural area & by postmen on bicycles in built up areas.{ {Collections}from post-boxes 2 or 3 times per day.Mail taken to main sorting office in Newbury. {TELECOMMUNICATIONS}Most families have telephone(STD).5{public phone}boxes in area which tend to be vandalised & misused.All calls go through Newbury exchange. {TELEGRAMS}can no longer be sent as service has been discontinued. {POST OFFICES}Two in area which can deal with pensions,savings certificates,P.O.Savings Bank,Premium Bonds,National Insurance stamps & T.V. licences.Car tax has to be obtained from General Post Office. {PARCELS}sent by Mail Order firms delivered commercially.
